document.heading: District of Columbia Housing Finance Agency Act Amendment Act of 1985

history.narrative: Law 6-44, the “District of Columbia Housing Finance Agency Act Amendment Act of 1985,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-207, which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 25, 1985, and July 9, 1985, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 16, 1985, it was assigned Act No. 6-62 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
